replies.body: Add me? I'm a mid lane main who wants to get better, so you can teach me?

Frankly if you feel comfortable on certain champs stick to those champs and only include champs from the tier list you can actually play. Tier lists are very deceptive like that. Don't treat them like the bible.

> [{quoted}](name=StealthVortex88,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=KhjxUVE9,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-25T03:06:09.985+0000)
>
> Add me? I'm a mid lane main who wants to get better, so you can teach me?

> Follow this tier list, as you're a mid laner, pick annie and only play annie until plat elo [Follow this tier list](http://i.imgur.com/zqmtyiq.jpg) (please not, you can only chose 2 or 3 champions at most per role) Only focus on farming, do not roam. (this is to learn the basics) only join the team for kills you know have 100% chance of success (90% at the least) or for teamfights/objectives
